keyMoments.title: Operation Utopia Fully Revealed
keyMoments.description: Crocodile reveals the complete details of Baroque Works' masterplan, Operation Utopia, which aims to overthrow Arabasta and acquire the ancient weapon Pluton.
keyMoments.significance: The full scope of the criminal organization's conspiracy is revealed, showing years of meticulous planning.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 2 Executes King Impersonation
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works officer agent Mr. 2 Bon Clay uses his Devil Fruit to impersonate King Cobra and make a false public confession.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the organization's ability to manipulate entire nations through strategic use of Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 1 and Miss Doublefinger Attack Nanohana
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works officer agents crash an armory ship into Nanohana, providing weapons to the rebels and creating chaos.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the coordinated nature of Operation Utopia with multiple agents executing different parts simultaneously.

keyMoments.title: Operation Utopia Enters Final Phase
keyMoments.description: With the fake king's confession, the attack on Nanohana, and the arming of the rebels complete, the civil war begins as planned by Baroque Works.
keyMoments.significance: The culmination of years of planning by Baroque Works comes to fruition as the rebellion marches on Alubarna.

bases.description: Crocodile's casino headquarters where he conducts Baroque Works operations
